name: Samurai Princess 2
description:
is a game about slicing leaves in a bamboo forest.

You play as a girl who wants to be a samurai, so she trains how to use her sword with the help of an old man. Slice leaves, cut leaves and slash leaves to raise your score, so you can become the "Samurai Princess".

This is the first game that i completed, so what you think about it? Also comment what scores you achieved. If there are any bugs left or if you got some improvement ideas, let me know.
